web_snippets: Des Whelan is known for Beetlejuice Beetlejuice (2024), The Banshees of Inisherin (2022) and Disclaimer (2024). More at IMDbPro.
Des Whelan, the founding Director, and shareholder of WLR, is stepping down from his role as CEO after 45 years in radio.
Des Whelan Assoc BSC. Category: Associates. Role: Camera ... Des had never been on a big Hollywood set before, not to mention meeting with a Director.
